common.errorMessage:
Login ID does not exist. Please enter a valid Email Address or enter your mobile number starting with country code without 00 (e.g: 966XXXXXXX, 965XXXXXXXXX, 973XXXXXXXXX).

Note: If you are STC Home customer, please login with your landline number starting with region code without 0 (e.g: 11444XXXX)Note: If you are STC Home customer, please login with your landline number starting with region code without 0 (e.g: 11444XXXX)
